author: pdobacz
content: Name change ☝️ PR https://github.com/ipsilon/eof/pull/68. Let us know if there's any _strong_ objections, otherwise will be merged within a few days.

author: pdobacz
content:
In terms of the max call stack depth and light failures, the current spec variant we're opting for is:
  - keep call stack depth checks in new CREATE/CALL instructions
  - keep call stack depth failure a light failure (alongside balance check)
  - give those light failure scenarios the existing EXT*CALL status code of `1` (same as for revert in the callee frame)

Main motivation for this is diverging as little as possible from current semantics, as Danno noted above.

Those rules will be applied to the Update EIP-7069 PR which is being prepared now.

author: poojaranjan
content: FYI, also updated the Protocol Calendar for the next meeting to refelct the time at 16:00 UTC.
